overview:
Moazzam Ahmed is founder and CEO at Mobile Queue Technologies. Moazzam is passionate about process and is working on using technology to automate everyday processes.

After working in the IT industry for over 18 years, for companies such as Microsoft and Nokia, Moazzam started his own Startup based in Seattle last year. He is interested in connecting businesses and customers for efficient order processing and increased productivity.

Moazzam also founded a community portal to automate event publicity and to drive registration.

Recently Moazzam graduated from a Master’s program in Organizational Development from Seattle U. He facilitates leadership development workshops with non-profits and also advises Executive Directors.

Moazzam lives in Bellevue, WA with his wife and children.
